endpoint_metadata.title: Avathon APM API
endpoint_metadata.description: Shows the value information of the selected monitored datasources given a period, grouping and aggregation type.

query_parameters.name: dataSourceIds
query_parameters.description: Valid dataSource ids separated by commas. Limit of 10 data source ids per request.

query_parameters.name: startDate
query_parameters.description: Start DateTime of the query in ISO 8601 format.

query_parameters.name: endDate
query_parameters.description: End DateTime of the query in ISO 8601 format.

query_parameters.name: grouping
query_parameters.description: Which interval to apply. Note: Duration limit for month, week, and day level aggregation is 1 month. Duration limit for minute level aggregation is 1 week.

query_parameters.name: granularity
query_parameters.description: Granularity of the given grouping method. It should be 1-60 for minute, 1-23 for hour, 1-31 for days. Granularity is ignored for week, month, quarter and year. Note: If the granularity is not within the specified limits, the call will fail.

query_parameters.name: aggregationType
query_parameters.description: Operation to apply for the grouping. Sum without zeros = 0, Average = 1, Maximum = 6, Minimum = 7, Count = 9, Sum with zeros = 11

query_parameters.name: elementId
query_parameters.description: Element Id if element level aggregation is needed. Plant level aggregation is returned if not passed.

query_parameters.name: page
query_parameters.description: The page of results to retrieve.
